thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: John O'Leary
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by John O'Leary

author: John O'Leary
title: John O'Leary
text: My case was handled by Cori Naron. Cori is kind, skilled and professional. She has an enormous knowledge about financial affairs and explained everything to me about the settlement process clearly and completely. There were times when I was very worried and upset about my situation and Cori took the time to give me the information I needed to feel better and more confident about my future. Cori is always pleasant and easy to work with and I am pleased to commend her for her effective work on my behalf. Sklar Associates are fortunate to have Cori Naron on their staff.
